vclaim: A photograph shows Japan's Sessho-seki ("Killing Stone) after it broke in half in March 2022.
title: Japan’s ‘Killing Stone,’ Rumored To House an Evil Spirit, Has Split in Half
subtitle: While we can't speak to the existence of the supposed evil spirit, Sessho-seki (the "Killing Stone") truly did split in two in March 2022.
author: Dan Evon
